page.title: 17FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My family has two sets of twins,Adam and Ryan who are eleven and Rebecca and Kevin who are sixteen.Kevin and Rebecca are my half brother and sister because my Mum's first husband was killed in a motorbike accident fourteen years ago.My Mum and Dad are also twins. We live in a four bedroomed house in Draycott Avenue,Taunton.One of the bedrooms is a converted loft. Ryan and I share a bedroom.The house is forty- one years old. We have moved houses seven or eight times in my life.Before I was born my Mum and Dad lived in Germany and Ireland.This is because Dad was in the army.Now he works as a driver and my Mum is a dental receptionist. When I grow up I want to be a solicitor.If I am,I will have to work hard.
